jobTitle: Catering Sales & Event Manager - Remote | WFH
description:
**Job Title: Catering Sales & Event Manager**

  • Salary:** $75,000 - $85,000 with potential bonuses; total compensation could reach up to $120,000

Role Summary

We are seeking a dynamic and passionate Catering Sales & Event Manager to join our team. This critical role is responsible for generating new business and ensuring the flawless execution of events. As the primary point of contact for clients, you will understand their needs and deliver a seamless and enjoyable event experience. This role requires flexibility with work hours, including days, nights, and weekends, and involves a mix of office work, remote work, and on-site event management.

Key Responsibilities

**Business Development:**

  • Implement and follow a monthly sales plan to drive new business opportunities.
  • Schedule and execute sales activities, including client outreach, site visits, and strategic email campaigns.
  • Develop marketing materials and sales presentations to attract and retain clients.

Event Management

  • Plan, coordinate, and oversee events from start to finish, ensuring high standards of service and attention to detail.
  • Lead event planning meetings, keeping staff informed and engaged.
  • Facilitate all aspects of event planning and logistics in collaboration with clients and event planners.

Client Relations

  • Serve as the main point of contact for clients, understanding their needs and ensuring a high-quality event experience.
  • Design and deliver catering menus in collaboration with clients, management, and chefs.
  • Ensure prompt and professional communication for all business matters.

Industry Engagement

  • Attend industry events, tradeshows, and conferences to generate business and stay updated on market trends.
  • Represent the company professionally at various industry events.

Financial Management

  • Manage deposits and payments according to company procedures.
  • Ensure accurate and timely completion of all financial transactions.

Team Collaboration

  • Collaborate with other departments to develop client-focused solutions and ensure seamless event execution.
  • Maintain a professional appearance and attitude at all times.

Requirements

**Education and Experience:**

  • Bachelor's degree preferred or equivalent work experience.
  • 2-4 years of experience in large-scale, high-budget event planning or catering.

Technical Skills

  • Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, Photoshop, and internet research. Knowledge of TPP is a plus.

Personal Attributes

  • Flexible, creative problem-solver with a positive attitude.
  • Self-motivated and highly organized with excellent attention to detail.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, set priorities, and meet deadlines.

Communication Skills

  • Strong customer service focus with evolved interpersonal skills.
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills.

Work Environment

  • High level of discretion and integrity.
  • Comfortable and effective in a fast-paced, high-energy environment.
  • Willingness to work weekends, evenings, and non-traditional hours as needed.

Additional Qualities

  • Resilient, competent, and able to handle the demands of the role with professionalism and confidence.

About The Role

This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a dynamic environment, loves to have fun at work, and has a keen eye for detail. If you are driven, enjoy building relationships, and are passionate about delivering exceptional events, we would love to hear from you!

To Apply

Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you would be a great fit for this role. We look forward to the possibility of working with you!

*Only candidates meeting the requirements will be considered.*

Employment Type: Full-Time
